miknn 1.0
  • Reference

Determine the Optimum K

mi_kopt.Rd

Determine the Optimum K

mi_kopt(dt, var.d, var.c, k.series, global = TRUE)

Arguments

dt

a data.frame object
var.d

the name of the discrete variable in quotations
var.c

the name of the continuouse variable in quotations
k.series

a vector of integers to test
global

set as TRUE by default. Set to FALSE for specific MI

Examples

library(miknn)

# determining I for a series of k
k.series <- 3:40
mi_kopt(iris, "Species","Sepal.Length", k.series, global = FALSE)
